Instruction: Pat tuna steak dry with paper towels.
Season tuna steak with salt and black pepper on both sides.
If using sesame seeds, coat the tuna steak with them.
Heat olive oil in a cast iron skillet over high heat until shimmering.
Place tuna steak in the hot skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes per side for rare, or longer for desired doneness.
Remove tuna steak from skillet and let rest for a few minutes before serving.
